message: Let's be fair, Bob. This offer leaves us both with a good deal.
Alice, my turn! I believe this offer is more balanced and reflects the value we both bring to the table.
Bob, this offer is still generous considering the inflation and the fact that I'll be making the offer in the next round if you decline.
Alice, this is my final offer. It's the best I can do considering the inflation.  If you decline, the value will decrease even further for me next round, making it impossible to accept any offer.
